Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Connective Tissue Diseases/Cartilage Diseases/Chondromalacia Patellae
Record.Description: A degeneration of the ARTICULAR CARTILAGE of the PATELLA, caused by a decrease in sulfated MUCOPOLYSACCHARIDES in the ground substance. When accompanied by pain, it is sometimes considered part of or confused with PATELLOFEMORAL PAIN SYNDROME.
